sourcesContent:
import { Navbar, Container, Form, Col, Row, InputGroup, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Formik } from 'formik'; import * as yup from 'yup'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faEye } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import GlobalStyleSheet from '../styleSheet'; import Link from 'next/link'; const styles = { body: { background: `${GlobalStyleSheet.body_color}`, position: 'absolute', top: '0', left: '0', right: '0', bottom: '0', }, buttons: { background: `${GlobalStyleSheet.primry_color}`, border: 'none', }, container: { background: 'white', border: `0.5px solid ${GlobalStyleSheet.primry_color}`, marginTop: '50px', padding: '20px 30px' }, label: { width: '100%', fontSize: '14px', paddingBottom: '5px', }, fontawesome: { color: `${GlobalStyleSheet.primary_text_color}`, width: '15px', height: '15px', maxHeight: '15px', maxWidth: '15px', }, } const schema = yup.object({ mobile: yup.string().required(), fullName: yup.string().required(), verificationCode: yup.string().required(), email: yup.string(), password: yup.string().required(), confirmPassword: yup.string().required(), gender: yup.string().required(), }); class Signup extends Component { state = { }; render() { return ( { ({ handleSubmit, handleChange, handleBlur, values, touched, isValid, errors, }) => (
Muhalik
Mobile Number * {errors.mobile} Full Name * Looks good! Verification Code * {errors.city} Email Address {errors.city} Password * {errors.username} Confirm Password * {errors.username} {/* 4th Row */} Gender
By creating an account, you agree to Muhalik's Terms & Conditions . Already have an account Signin {/* End 4th Row */}
)} ); } } export default Signup;
